typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,
		Column_22 as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		Column_24 as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		Column_26 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> src01sales
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> src02currency
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> src03currencyrate
src01sales select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID = Column_1,
		RevisionNumber = Column_2,
		OrderDate = Column_3,
		DueDate = Column_4,
		ShipDate = Column_5,
		Status = Column_6,
		OnlineOrderFlag = Column_7,
		SalesOrderNumber = Column_8,
		PurchaseOrderNumber = Column_9,
		AccountNumber = Column_10,
		CustomerID = Column_11,
		SalesPersonID = Column_12,
		TerritoryID = Column_13,
		BillToAddressID = Column_14,
		ShipToAddressID = Column_15,
		ShipMethodID = Column_16,
		CreditCardID = Column_17,
		CreditCardApprovalCode = Column_18,
		CurrencyRateID = Column_19,
		SubTotal = Column_20,
		TaxAmt = Column_21,
		Freight = Column_22,
		TotalDue = Column_23,
		Comment = Column_24,
		rowguid = Column_25,
		ModifiedDate = Column_26
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(SalesOrderID = toInteger(SalesOrderID),
		RevisionNumber = toInteger(RevisionNumber),
		OrderDate = OrderDate,
		DueDate = DueDate,
		ShipDate = ShipDate,
		Status = toInteger(Status),
		OnlineOrderFlag = OnlineOrderFlag,
		SalesOrderNumber = SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber = PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber = AccountNumber,
		CustomerID = toInteger(CustomerID),
		SalesPersonID = toInteger(SalesPersonID),
		TerritoryID = toInteger(TerritoryID),
		BillToAddressID = toInteger(BillToAddressID),
		ShipToAddressID = toInteger(ShipToAddressID),
		ShipMethodID = toInteger(ShipMethodID),
		CreditCardID = toInteger(CreditCardID),
		CreditCardApprovalCode = CreditCardApprovalCode,
		CurrencyRateID = toInteger(CurrencyRateID),
		SubTotal = toDecimal(SubTotal, 12, 4),
		TaxAmt = toDecimal(TaxAmt, 8, 4),
		Freight = toDecimal(Freight, 8, 4),
		TotalDue = toDecimal(TotalDue, 12, 4),
		Comment = Comment,
		rowguid = rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = toTimestamp(ModifiedDate),
		Z_PID_ModifiedDate = toInteger(replace(left(ModifiedDate, 7), '-',''))) ~> DerivedColumn1
src02currency select(mapColumn(
		CurrencyCode = Column_1,
		Name = Column_2,
		ModifiedDate = Column_3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select2
Select2 derive(CurrencyCode = CurrencyCode,
		Name = Name,
		ModifiedDate = toTimestamp(ModifiedDate)) ~> DerivedColumn2
src03currencyrate select(mapColumn(
		CurrencyRateID = Column_1,
		CurrencyRateDate = Column_2,
		FromCurrencyCode = Column_3,
		ToCurrencyCode = Column_4,
		AverageRate = Column_5,
		EndOfDayRate = Column_6,
		ModifiedDate = Column_7
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select3
Select3 derive(CurrencyRateID = toInteger(CurrencyRateID),
		CurrencyRateDate = toTimestamp(CurrencyRateDate),
		FromCurrencyCode = FromCurrencyCode,
		ToCurrencyCode = ToCurrencyCode,
		AverageRate = toDecimal(AverageRate, 8, 4),
		EndOfDayRate = toDecimal(EndOfDayRate, 8, 4),
		ModifiedDate = toTimestamp(ModifiedDate),
		Z_PID_ModifiedDate = toInteger(replace(left(ModifiedDate, 7), '-',''))) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		StoreID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		AccountNumber as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Z_PID_ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		StoreID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		AccountNumber as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sink2
DerivedColumn3 sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		StoreID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		AccountNumber as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Z_PID_ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
